content: If you button the first button of your shirt wrong, all the others will be buttoned wrong. That's also the case with many other things in life.
translations: ita:Se abbottoni il primo bottone della tua camicia in modo sbagliato, tutti gli altri saranno abbottonati male. Quello Ã¨ an
